actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-249.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Finance.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Finance of the Senate to make expenditures from the contingent fund of the Senate, and to employ personnel in holding hearings and making investigations authorized by the Legislative Reorganization Act and in accordance with rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate. Sets limits on amounts and types of expenditures.

titles.title: An original resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Finance.
